sentences.english: Thorpe also showed that the chaffinch is selective imitate.

sentences.english: Ms. Thorp fills up at a hydrogen station on the campus of the University of California at Irvine.
sentences.chinese: 索普女士在加利福吉亚大学欧文分校的加氢站加氢。

sentences.english: ”Thorpe said,“How could anyone get hurt playing football?”
sentences.chinese: 索普回答说，“打橄榄球怎么会受伤呢？”

sentences.english: Mapplethorpe's photographs were first put on display in New York.
sentences.chinese: 梅普尔索普的照片首次在纽约展出。

sentences.english: Boundy pointed that the brilliant performance of Thorpe has greatly enhanced Australia's eminent position.

sentences.english: Have the local police said anything about riots in Scunthorpe?
sentences.chinese: 警察说过斯肯索普地区有暴动的事了吗？

sentences.english: From Scunthorpe's point of view, they should take a lot of pride from the game.
sentences.chinese: 从斯肯索普的角度看，他们也可以为自己感到骄傲。

sentences.english: As soon as divine service was over, the Thorpes and Allens eagerly joined each other;
sentences.chinese: 一作完礼拜，索普一家和艾伦夫妇便急忙跑到了一起。

sentences.english: A group of women in Mablethorpe in 1946.

sentences.english: This is not Ms. Thorp’s first clean vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 这并非索普女士的第一辆清洁汽车。

sentences.english: Ms. Thorp pays $649 a month to lease the car.
sentences.chinese: 索普女士每月付649美元租用这辆车。
